title: South Dakota Legislators Plan Bills to Help Residents in Fight Over Limestone Mine
description: Three lawmakers who represent Piedmont, South Dakota, hope to change weak state mining laws that allowed a proposed limestone mine to be sited without notification or input by any local officials or residents. The plan by Simon Contractors to begin …
